metadata.Title: CVE-2016-1523 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description:
The SillMap::readFace function in FeatureMap.cpp in Libgraphite in Graphite 2 1.2.4, as used in Mozilla Firefox before 43.0 and Firefox ESR 38.x before 38.6.1, mishandles a return value, which allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (missing initialization, NULL pointer dereference, and application crash) via a crafted Graphite smart font.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-1523` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libgraphite2-3 - 1.3.5-1ubuntu1
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

thunderbird - 1:38.6.0+build1-0ubuntu1
thunderbird-globalmenu - 1:38.6.0+build1-0ubuntu1
thunderbird-gnome-support - 1:38.6.0+build1-0ubuntu1
thunderbird-mozsymbols - 1:38.6.0+build1-0ubuntu1
thunderbird-testsuite - 1:38.6.0+build1-0ubuntu1
xul-ext-calendar-timezones - 1:38.6.0+build1-0ubuntu1
xul-ext-gdata-provider - 1:38.6.0+build1-0ubuntu1
xul-ext-lightning - 1:38.6.0+build1-0ubuntu1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: graphite2 package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.3.5-1ubuntu1').
thunderbird package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1:38.6.0+build1-0ubuntu1').
